content: the cresting waves washcloth is reversible textured quick and easy all music to my ears when i m crocheting a washcloth or dishcloth this may become your go-to gifting cloth the set has two available sizes regular size is about an 8 20cm square cloth while the oversized is 10 25cm i used a size 4mm hook use whatever s right for you just take into account if you go up a hook size you ll need more yarn two balls of dishie will get you two regular sized cloths and one oversized cloth i used one solid color and one twist looks great as a solid color or with the stripe instructions are included for where to add stripes happy crocheting
